title: Client turned PBE???
body: I clicked on my normal client and it went thru this big update and I noticed it said PBE in the top right corner... So I just let it do its thing and then I log in and its PBE, I tried to change PBE to anything else but its only on PBE... Anyone have any idea??? I uninstalled and reinstalled from the download on the main page and it still says PBE...

replies.body: OK soooo What i did was... Uninstalled it once again reinstalled it and I have to do into the Riot Games folder and run the lol patcher.ADMIN to get to the normal game... Really odd... bc i have never changed or modified any file in league.

Where did you download the installation for this?  It definitely sounds like you installed the PBE client.  :X  You can download the normal client [here](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)!  That should get you to the right place!
